title: FS - 1910 T212 Obak - Reduced Again - Gone
author: CobbSpikedMe

posts.post_title: FS - 1910 T212 Obak - Reduced Again - Gone
posts.post_content:
Hey guys,

Here is a neat Obak.  It has an imprinted stamp at the bottom.  You can sort of see it in the scan.  Of course, it is also trimmed at the bottom and there is a hole punched in the top right, but the stamp is cool. :)

GONE Dlvd.  Paypal Friends only please.  PM me with any questions or to say "I'll take it".

Thanks a lot,

AndyH

Ok, Let's try one more reduction here.  Only $8.00 Dlvd now.  You can't lose here. :p

Thanks a lot,

AndyH

Andy--

Be glad to send you some cash and cards if you have no takers.

Great image on the card.

OBC

Hey Peter!

It's yours my friend.  I'll get it out to you shortly. Feel free to send back whatever you think is cool.  My lists are up to date.

Thanks a lot,

AndyH
